long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Burnin' Rubber 5 is the version as it was intended to be! Battle over 30 challenges against the toughest opponents ever. Unlock new cars, buy new weapons and upgrades. Itâ€™s a massive 3D action arcade racing game, completely remastered. Jam-packed with all of the destructive goodness that made the previous games such a huge success!

Go to the Extension tab (in the top-right side, between search address and settings, you have to click a gray piece ). After you open the Extension tab, pin extension. Now, just click the extension located in the top-right corner.
